seo.title: Transition coaching | SustainSage
seo.description: Steady, ICF-aligned coaching for relocation and role changes in the UK.

hero.title: Transition coaching for relocation and role changes
hero.subtitle: Steady support to land, re-orient and choose next steps that fit your real life.
hero.ctaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about transition coaching
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a person navigating new paths

for.title: Who this is for
items: You’ve moved (or are moving) to the UK and feel stretched between systems, languages and roles.
You’re changing roles or sectors and want a grounded, values-led plan.
You’re returning after a break and don’t want to burn out proving yourself.

cards.title: Your context
cards.body: Visas, money, care, networks, expectations—naming constraints without turning them into excuses.

cards.title: Your values & identity
cards.body: What you want to protect, grow, or leave behind in this new chapter.

cards.title: Real options
cards.body: Roles, routes and rhythms that are actually available to you now.

cards.title: Experiments
cards.body: Small, reversible steps to test directions before committing.

package.title: How the package works
items: 6 × 60-min sessions over 8–12 weeks (online).
Light check-ins between sessions when helpful (email or short notes, not 24/7).
Shared notes after sessions to capture your insights and decisions.

session.title: What a session feels like
paragraphs: You bring what’s live; we listen, reflect patterns, ask questions and co-design next steps.

prompts.title: Reflective prompts
items: What would “settled enough for now” look like three months from today?
Which expectations truly belong to you—and which belong to others, old systems or fear?
If you could try one small, low-risk move this month, what would you choose?

boundaries.title: Boundaries & ethics
items: Not therapy, counselling, legal or immigration advice.
If specialist support seems needed, we’ll say so and invite you to consider it.
You keep responsibility and authorship; we hold process and partnership.

cta.title: Ready for a gentle starting point?
cta.body: Tell us about your transition and we’ll map possible next steps together.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about transition coaching

seo.title: Confidence & voice coaching | SustainSage
seo.description: Coaching to speak up, set boundaries and stay yourself in UK workplaces.

hero.title: Confidence & voice in UK workplaces
hero.subtitle: Coaching to speak up, set boundaries and stay yourself in a new culture.
hero.ctaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about confidence coaching
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a person sharing ideas in a meeting

for.title: Who this is for
items: You second-guess your English, accent or “right to speak” in meetings.
You avoid difficult conversations with managers, peers or clients.
You’re navigating cultural codes and want to stay respectful without disappearing.

cards.title: Inner stories
cards.body: Beliefs about “good enough English”, authority, failure and visibility.

cards.title: Everyday interactions
cards.body: Meetings, emails, feedback, saying no, asking for what you need.

cards.title: Boundaries
cards.body: How to protect time, energy and ethics without drama.

cards.title: Allyship & support
cards.body: Building people and practices that help you show up.

package.title: How the package works
items: 4–6 × 60-min sessions over 6–10 weeks, online.
Practical experiments between sessions (e.g. one clear ask, one small “no”, one brave email).

session.title: What a session feels like
paragraphs: Grounded, bilingual space where you can try language out loud.
We explore beliefs, rehearse conversations and agree on small experiments that feel possible now.

prompts.title: Reflective prompts
items: Where are you already trusted more than you trust yourself?
If you could express one thing more directly this month, what would it be?
What does “respectful and clear” look like in your voice—not someone else’s?

boundaries.title: Boundaries & ethics
items: Not presentation training or a promise of promotion.
No workplace legal judgments; we encourage HR or professional advice when needed.
We don’t guarantee outcomes—you stay in authorship.

cta.title: Curious to explore your voice?
cta.body: Share a few lines about the conversations you’re holding and we’ll co-design a gentle next step.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about confidence coaching

seo.title: Clarity experiments coaching | SustainSage
seo.description: Short coaching series to test career possibilities through small experiments.

hero.title: Clarity through small experiments
hero.subtitle: A short coaching series to test possible paths instead of waiting for a perfect answer.
hero.ctaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about clarity experiments
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of branching paths and lightbulbs

for.title: Who this is for
items: You don’t hate your current path, but “this can’t be it forever”.
You’re stuck between multiple options and keep looping in your head.
You’re afraid of choosing “wrong” and wasting limited time/visa/money.

cards.title: Design tiny experiments
cards.body: Informational chats, small projects, volunteering, job try-outs, skill labs.

cards.title: Read the results
cards.body: What energised you, what drained you, what you learned.

package.title: How the package works
items: 3–4 × 60-min sessions over 4–6 weeks.
Each session ends with 1–2 concrete experiments you design and own.

session.title: What a session feels like
paragraphs: We map what you’re noticing, design experiments that feel safe enough and review learning quickly.

prompts.title: Reflective prompts
items: What do you already know you don’t want to repeat?
If you treated the next 3 months as a test, not a verdict, what becomes possible?
What would “a little more honest” look like in your work week?

boundaries.title: Boundaries & ethics
items: We won’t provide a “perfect calling” answer; you make the decisions.
We avoid financial or legal advice beyond the coaching scope.
Experiments stay within your consent and capacity; we adjust when needed.

cta.title: Ready to test possibilities?
cta.body: Bring the questions you’re holding and we’ll sketch a light, respectful plan.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about clarity experiments
